pages.text: Used to create $(l:base_potions#awkward)Awkward Potion$(/l), which in turn serves as the base for most potions.
Add Redstone Dust to a potion to extend its duration.$(br2)$(o)Not all potions can be extended.$()
Add Glowstone Dust to a potion to enhance its potency.$(br2)$(o)Not all potions can be enhanced.$()

Used to create $(l:base_potions#weakness)Potion of Weakness$(/l), which is needed to cure Zombie Villagers.$(br2)Add Fermented Spider Eye to a potion to corrupt its effect.$(br2)$(o)Not all potions can be corrupted.$()
Add Gunpowder to a potion to create a splash version of it.
Add Dragon's Breath to a splash potion to create a lingering version of it.
